android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

ANDROID.PERMISSION.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

ANDROID.PERMISSION.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.google.firebase.iid.FirebaseInstanceIdReceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: com.google.android.c2dm.permission.SEND
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

binary_analysis.title: Found elf built without Position Independent Executable (PIE) flag
binary_analysis.desc: In order to prevent an attacker from reliably jumping to, for example, a particular exploited function in memory, Address space layout randomization (ASLR) randomly arranges the address space positions of key data areas of a process, including the base of the executable and the positions of the stack, heap and libraries. Built with option -pie.

playstore_details.title: Vlog Star for YouTube - free video editor & maker
playstore_details.description:
Best video editor for Youtube & Free Video Star with music and transitions, easy to make a video/photo slideshow and cool music beats videos. Use the video editing & video creator app to add movie effects to make music videos, cinematic movie video with effects. And it can even be the video intro maker for your videos. Splice videos to make montage video and vlog easy video.
 
Vlog Star helps you easily create Youtube Vlogs, Instagram Stories, TikTok videos, WhatsApp status and more. Vlog Star is the pro app for the final cut of your video star vlogs!
 
 
Key Features:
 
Video Filters & FX Effects
- Use film-level video filters to make a leap of the video quality.
- Choose from dozens of cool FX video filto and effects which ranges from glitch, VHS to lomotif, retro, vinkle. 
- Adjust video with brightness, contrast, saturation, vignette, temperature and more.
 
Text & Stickers & Music
- Use beautiful animated text opener as the intro for your vlog video & social videos.
- Custom your text with fonts, alight stroke, shadow, animation features.
- Provide hundreds of stickers including motion stickers, youtube subscribe, vloggers, emojis and more.
- Hundreds of no copyright music and sound effects cast a magic to your video like magisto.
 
Video Transitions
- Provide 50+ amazing transitions and keep updating more, including video star style and glitch style.
- Use transition effects with fast & alight motion to create a pro and cinematic video.
 
Music Beats Video & Music Slideshow
- One click to add video clips/photos into stylish musical wevideo templates. 
- Jitter, camera shake, glitch, VHS, shades… awesome tens of fx effects and transitions to perfect your music beating videos.
- Endless slideshows and music beats video within 30 seconds for Tik Tok, Youtube studio, ins stories, IGTV and your unique Vlog. 
- Musical templates continuously update. 
 
Reaction Camera
- Powerful reaction video maker. You can record and edit your reaction video without using the computer.
- Search videos on YouTube and record your reaction directly, like reacting to a youtube boomerang or a meme and LOL with you fans!
- Pause and comment during your reaction recording.
- Add frames for the PIP videos.
 
Video Trimmer & Splitter & Merger & Converter
- Trim and cut videos. Splice one video into two clips.
- Crop video into landscape, portrait or square ratio.
- Viva cut your videos and merge those videos into one. Helpful for making YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Tik Tok videos.
- A video editor to convert photos into 1080p or 720p videos in MP4 format.
 
Video Speed Control
- Adjust video speed to make your video more stunning.
- Fast / Slow motion video maker with speed adjustment up to 4 times.
- Get the filmmaker skill of adding alight motions and make your videos cinematic and movie-like.
 
Video Background:
- Change the background color of your video with no crop needed.
- You can scale and blur your video background. You can also go to funimate your video background like a pro kinemaster and get likee from your fans.
 
No Ads during Editing:
- No banner or pop-up ads whatsoever when you are editing videos.
- A video editor that never disturbs. No ads or watermark after upgrading to the pro version.
 
Download the powerful video editor for vloggers -- Vlog Star. You can also be the power and action director of your legend daily life!
